spells.name: Feast on Fear
spells.description: Targets are panicked, and you gain temporary hit points.

spells.name: Repair Undead, Mass
spells.description: Heals undead of 1d8 hp + 1/level; affects 1 undead/level.

spells.name: Vampiric Shadow Shield
spells.description: As fire shield, except attackers take negative energy damage and attacks heal you.

spells.name: Whip of Centipedes
spells.description: Create a whip made of poisonous centipedes.
